title: Truffle can not be installed (showing errors)
body:
- [x] I've asked for help in the [Truffle Gitter](http://gitter.im/Consensys/truffle) before filing this issue.

---------------------------

## Issue

I am trying to install truffle but it's always showing me the same errors and i cannot encounter the problem. I have tried all the possible solution but it cannot be installed. Can you help me to solve this issue?

## Steps to Reproduce

I Used my cmd administrative mode to install truffle. Using the command "npm install -g truffle" as well as "npm install -g truffle@4.1.13". However, it's showing me the same error always.

## Expected Behavior

I want to install truffle for my blockchain project to connect to local test network, public test network and main network

## Actual Results

The actual result is below-
PS C:\WINDOWS\system32> npm install -g truffle
npm ERR! code ENOENT
npm ERR! errno ENOENT
npm ERR! enoent request to https://registry.npmjs.org/truffle failed, reason: connect ENOENT /my.proxyserver.com:8080
npm ERR! enoent This is related to npm not being able to find a file.
npm ERR! enoent

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     C:\Users\mehra\AppData\Roaming\npm-cache\_logs\2018-10-06T05_58_53_724Z-debug.log
PS C:\WINDOWS\system32>
here is the screenshot->
![annotation](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43901088/46567936-69e57b80-c96f-11e8-8c1a-d8f7e7880515.png)

## Environment

* Operating System: Windows 10 (Version- 1809)
* Ethereum client: 
* Truffle version (`truffle version`): 4.1.13 or global version
* node version (`node --version`): 8.12.0
* npm version (`npm --version`): 6.4.1
